xuiContent
directive in module xui

Description

Content wrapper. The purpose of this component is to hold content inside of it.

Usage

as element:
<xui-content
       size="{string}">
</xui-content>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
sizestring

Size of container. Values: 'large', 'normal', or 'small'.

(default: 'normal')

Example

Source
